EmailTemplate.description: Template used for sending TMLA pdf-template to customer for signature
EmailTemplate.name: TMLA - Sending of Agreement to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Trademark License Agreement: DuPont - {!Qualification__c.Account_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr. Mrs. {!Qualification__c.Related_Contact__c}, We would like to thank you for your interest in becoming a DuPont™ Brand® licensee. To formalize our cooperation we hereby send you an Agreement for your review and signature.
If you agree with the attached contract, please print out 2 copies and complete the Exhibit named "INSURANCE". The completed and signed original contracts can then be send by post to our Geneva office, as per the below address details:
DuPont de Nemours International S.A Attn: {!Qualification__c.LastModifiedBy} 2, ch. du Pavillon CH-1218 Le Grand-Saconnex / Geneva SWITZERLAND e-mail: emea.marketing@che.dupont.com
Should you, however, have any further questions regarding to the TMLA content, please do not hestiate to contact us for further clarifications.
We are looking forward to a very successful cooperation.
Kind regards
{!Qualification__c.LastModifiedBy} Brand Managment, DuPont EMEA Copyright (c) 2013 DuPont. All rights reserved. The DuPont Oval Logo, DuPont(TM), The miracles of science(TM) and all products denoted with (R) or (TM) are registered trademarks or trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or its affiliates. www.dupont.com | Legal Notices & Terms of Use | PRIVACY
